physical_appearance:\The image shows a rectangular card.  A passport sized photograph of an Indian man is displayed at the bottom left of the card. \\Royal Air Force Civilian Staff / Works / Trading Pass\\ is stated at the top of the identity card. Just below the headings
subject_terms_1:\\S. Appervoo\\ is stated as the holder. \\Singapore 395 Coronation Road\\ is stated as the address. \\Sub Contractor United Engineers\\ is stated as the occupation. \\United Engineers Ltd\\ is stated as the employer\u0027s name contractors air bases
subject_terms_2:and \\Singapore\\ is stated as the address. There is a pink stamp at the middle which states \\RAF Station Seletar Singapore\\ and \\17 Nov 1941\\. Near the bottom of the card Identification cards Contracting out Contractors RAF Seletar (Singapore)
subject_terms_3:it states \\Valid for Out-Stations: Lobokiad: Jabi and Ipoh.  \ Kandiar
 Appavoo
